messages.title: #STAND UP FOR WHAT MATTERS
messages.content: THIS ELECTION ISN’T ABOUT THE NEXT 5 YEARS—IT’S ABOUT THE NEXT 50 YEARS. Only the Green Party is offering real opposition to this Government’s extreme Brexit. Only the Green Party has the vision to deliver an innovative future for our country, and our place in the world. And only the Green Party offers a different kind of politics. Every Green vote on 8 June will help make that vision a reality. To shape an economy for everyone while protecting the same environment. To build affordable homes and provide properly funded health services. And to put power back in your hands through a citizen’s democracy. If you agree with us, stand with us. The Conservatives think they have this election sewn up. But it’s in your hands. Stand with us for decent homes, our NHS, our environment, and our future. We stand up for what matters. Vote Green Party on 8 June.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: an economy that works for all

issues.brexitEurope: Only the Green Party is offering real opposition to this Government’s extreme Brexit.
issues.economy: #FAIRECONOMY an economy that works for all, To shape an economy for everyone.
issues.education: I will work to protect and support all our education services which are under attack., #FREEEDUCATION quality education, no tuition fees.
issues.environment: #SAFECLIMATE fossil free, affordable energy, To shape an economy for everyone while protecting the same environment.
issues.governance: And to put power back in your hands through a citizen’s democracy.
issues.government: Only the Green Party is offering real opposition to this Government’s extreme Brexit., Only the Green Party has the vision to deliver an innovative future for our country, and our place in the world., Every Green vote on 8 June will help make that vision a reality.
issues.health: #PUBLICNHS taking back our health service, To build affordable homes and provide properly funded health services.

community.content: We need a different way of doing politics
And to put power back in your hands through a citizen’s democracy.

leaflet.personalStatement: Mark Green will continue to stand up for local people and the communities of Eddisbury. He has been involved in projects supporting young and elderly, single parents and those with disabilities. He has worked with multiple communities to improve access to nature, local people & wider for their communities.

politicalExperience.duration: He has lived in Eddisbury for nearly 15 years.

examples: He has lived in Eddisbury for nearly 15 years.
